comments: Abolished 1.4.1934 and added to the parish of Luckington.

Abolished 25.3.1884 and divided between the parishes of Foxley, 
    Westport St. Mary and Brokenborough.
See Table 2, note (a).

Abolished 1894 to become the separate parishes of Brokenborough 
    Without and Brokenborough Within.

Created 1.4.1897 by renaming the parish of Brokenborough Without. 
    See also Table 2, note (a).

Created 1894 from the part of the parish of Brokenborough in Malmesbury 
    Municipal Borough. Abolished 1.4.1897 and added to the parish of Westport 
    St. Mary Within.

Created 1894 from the rural part of the parish of Brokenborough. 
    Renamed 1.4.1897 to become the parish of Brokenborough.
